meanings.definition: Small letters of the alphabet as opposed to capital letters.
meanings.sent1: I prefer using lowercase when typing on the computer.
meanings.sent2: Remember to write your name in lowercase on the form.
meanings.sent3: The lowercase letters were having a party while the capital letters were asleep.
meanings.sent4: In the world of letters, lowercase characters are the humble workers.
meanings.sent5: The teacher emphasized the importance of recognizing lowercase in reading.

meanings.definition: To write or print in lowercase letters.
meanings.sent1: Please lowercase the text before sending the email.
meanings.sent2: She always forgets to lowercase the file names.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to lowercase its name by stepping on the keyboard.
meanings.sent4: His emotions seemed to lowercase as he wrote the heartfelt letter.
meanings.sent5: Lowercasing the document made it easier to read and understand.
